# fixtures

### MLN / SRM Aggregator Accounts

```shell
miraland config set --url https://api.devnet.miraland.io

# Pyth product: MLN/USD
miraland account 3Mnn2fX6rQyUsyELYms1sBJyChWofzSNRoqYzvgMVz5E --output-file 3Mnn2fX6rQyUsyELYms1sBJyChWofzSNRoqYzvgMVz5E.bin
# Pyth price: MLN/USD
miraland account J83w4HKfqxwcq3BEMMkPFSppX3gqekLyLJBexebFVkix --output-file J83w4HKfqxwcq3BEMMkPFSppX3gqekLyLJBexebFVkix.bin
# Pyth product: SRM/USD
miraland account 6MEwdxe4g1NeAF9u6KDG14anJpFsVEa2cvr5H6iriFZ8 --output-file 6MEwdxe4g1NeAF9u6KDG14anJpFsVEa2cvr5H6iriFZ8.bin
# Pyth price: SRM/USD
miraland account 992moaMQKs32GKZ9dxi8keyM2bUmbrwBZpK4p2K6X5Vs --output-file 992moaMQKs32GKZ9dxi8keyM2bUmbrwBZpK4p2K6X5Vs.bin
```
